00039 std::string TShapeSizeB3::get_name() const
00040   { return "TShapeSizeB3"; }
00041 
00042 TShapeSizeB3::~TShapeSizeB3() {}
00043 
00044 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00045                                            double& result, 
00046                                            MsqError& )
00047 {
00048   const double tau = det(T);
00049   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00050     result = 0.0;
00051     return false;
00052   }
00053   
00054   result = sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0 * std::log(tau) - 2;
00055   return true;
00056 }
00057 
00058 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00059                                                      double& result,
00060                                                      MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00061                                                      MsqError& err )
00062 {
00063   const double tau = det(T);
00064   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00065     result = 0.0;
00066     return false;
00067   }
00068   
00069   result = sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0 * std::log(tau) - 2;
00070   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00071   deriv_wrt_T -= 1/tau * transpose_adj(T);
00072   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00073   
00074   return true;
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00078                                                      double& result,
00079                                                      MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00080                                                      MsqMatrix<2,2> second_wrt_T[3],
00081                                                      MsqError& err )
00082 {
00083   const double tau = det(T);
00084   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00085     result = 0.0;
00086     return false;
00087   }
00088   
00089   result = sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0 * std::log(tau) - 2;
00090 
00091   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00092   const double it = 1/tau;
00093   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00094   deriv_wrt_T -= it * adjt;
00095   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00096   
00097   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 2*it*it, adjt );
00098   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -2*it );
00099   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 2.0 );
00100 
00101   return true;
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00106                              double& result, 
00107                              MsqError& )
00108 {
00109   const double tau = det(T);
00110   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00111     result = 0.0;
00112     return false;
00113   }
00114   
00115   double n = Frobenius(T);
00116   result = n*n*n - 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*( log(tau) + 1 );
00117   return true;
00118 }
00119 
00120 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00121                                        double& result,
00122                                        MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00123                                        MsqError& err )
00124 {
00125   const double tau = det(T);
00126   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00127     result = 0.0;
00128     return false;
00129   }
00130   
00131   double n = Frobenius(T);
00132   result = n*n*n - 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*( log(tau) + 1 );
00133   
00134   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00135   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00136   deriv_wrt_T *= 3*n;
00137   deriv_wrt_T -= 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE/tau * adjt;
00138   
00139   return true;
00140 }
00141 
00142 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00143                                        double& result,
00144                                        MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00145                                        MsqMatrix<3,3> second_wrt_T[6],
00146                                        MsqError& err )
00147 {
00148   const double tau = det(T);
00149   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00150     result = 0.0;
00151     return false;
00152   }
00153   
00154   double n = Frobenius(T);
00155   result = n*n*n - 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*( log(tau) + 1 );
00156   
00157   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00158   const double it = 1/tau;
00159   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00160   deriv_wrt_T *= 3*n;
00161   deriv_wrt_T -= 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*it * adjt;
00162   
00163   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 3/n, T );
00164   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 3*n );
00165   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*it, T );
00166   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*it*it, adjt );
00167   
00168   return true;
00169 }
